fields.request: Manual QA: Verify RFID scanner initializes on scan views only
fields.request_details:
1. Restart the application and monitor the logs; before visiting RFID scan pages there should be no new 'RFID hardware setup failed' errors.
2. Sign in as a staff user and open the admin Scan RFIDs page at /admin/core/rfid/scan/. Confirm the page loads and that RFID hardware initialization only appears in the logs once you access this view.
3. Visit the public RFID Tag Validator at /ocpp/rfid/reader/ and confirm the page loads without additional startup errors.
4. If hardware is available, scan a tag from either page to verify normal operation.
